newsitem.title: USA: Hytek Microsystems Inc Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Hytek Microsystems Inc Q3 net rises.

text.p: prior quarter ended June 29, 1996. As previously announced, Chesapeake Sciences Corp., the Company's largest customer, has postponed delivery of certain products from the second half of 1996 into the first quarter of 1997. During the quarter ended September 28, 1996, Chesapeake Sciences accounted for approximately 53% of net revenues as opposed to 75% of net revenues for the prior six months ended June 29, 1996.

Hytek also reported that its backlog of customer orders scheduled for delivery within one year was $5,181,000 at September 28, 1996 as compared to $7,912,000 at December 30, 1995 and $8,554,000 at September 30, 1995. Due to the possibility of customer changes in delivery schedules or cancellation of orders, the Company's backlog as of any particular date may not be a reliable indicator of actual future sales.
